mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feedback_receiver ( feedback_no , feedback_receiver , create_date , update_date ) VALUES ( #{feedbackNo} , #{feedbackReceiver} , NOW() , NOW() )

SELECT fr.feedback_receiver feedbackReceiver , t.work_member_email workMemberEmail , t.work_member_name workMemberName FROM ( SELECT wm.work_member_name , wm.work_member_email FROM task_member tm INNER JOIN project_member pm ON tm.project_member_no = pm.project_member_no INNER JOIN workspace_member wm ON pm.work_member_no = wm.work_member_no WHERE tm.task_no = #{taskNo} ) t LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT feedback_receiver FROM feedback_receiver WHERE feedback_no = #{feedbackNo} ) fr ON fr.feedback_receiver = t.work_member_email
SELECT count(feedback_receiver) receivedFeedback FROM feedback_receiver WHERE feedback_receiver = #{workMemberEmail}
